job_info.role_description: Candidate should be proficient in theory of automata

questions.question: Which formal machine recognizes exactly the class of regular languages?
2. The smallest number of states needed for any DFA that recognizes the language {aⁿb | n ≥ 0} is
4. The Pumping Lemma for regular languages is primarily used to

options.text: Minimize the number of DFA states
Prove that a given language is not regular
Convert an NFA to a DFA
Construct a regular expression from a DFA

questions.question: 5. The transition function of a Turing machine maps to

options.text: A new state and a stack operation
A new state, a symbol to write, and a head direction
A new state and an epsilon move

questions.question: Which of the following correctly describes the language recognized by the regular expression (a + b)*abb?

options.text: All strings over {a, b} that end with the substring “abb”
All strings over {a, b} that contain at least one occurrence of “abb” anywhere
All strings over {a, b} that start with “abb”
All strings over {a, b} that contain exactly one occurrence of “abb”
